00553 inline int32 
00554 LocationHashCell::getMaxHorizontal() const

00556    return m_rightHorizontal; 
00557 }
00558

00582 
00583 inline void 
00584 LocationHashTable::quickGetHashIndex(int32 hpos, int32 vpos,
00585                                      uint32 &hHash, uint32 &vHash) const
00586 {
00587    vHash = ( vpos - m_bottomVertical ) >> m_verticalShift;
00588    hHash = ( hpos - m_leftHorizontal ) >> m_horizontalShift;
00589 #ifdef _DEBUG
00590    uint32 v,h;
00591    getHashIndex(hpos, vpos, h, v);
00592    almostAssert(vHash == v);
00593    almostAssert(hHash == h);
00594 #endif
00595 }
